title: On the way to growing up: the miracle of birth
creator_credit: Brigham Young University and Instructional Television Services
brief_description: Designed to prepare the expectant parents for childbirth. Although each birth is different, each happens in a predictable sequence and learning what to expect is part of the training. Over cartoon drawings, the narrator explains the three things necessary for adequate preparation for childbirth: a positive attitude, accurate expectations and supportive techniques. The live births of three infants is recorded.
